website_summaries.verdict: A secure terrarium with great ventilation that works well for beginners.
pros: This terrarium has excellent ventilation and easy access front doors
There is space beneath the terrarium for a heating mat
The glass is of good quality and won't break even in high temperatures
Bottom of the terrarium is waterproof
Measures 12" x 12" x 12", with other sizes available
cons: Small creatures like young snakes and crickets can escape through the lid

customer_reviews.title: broken in pieces...twice
customer_reviews.text: What the hell is wrong with this delivery service? Twice in one week, they couldn't manage to get the stupid thing to my door without totally smashing it to pieces. I understand gravity is a constant force in the universe, and young and old, we are all going to fall to its power. But for crying out loud, when a box says fragile all over it in three different languages, and "GLASS" is printed in big-ass red letters that Helen Keller could read, don't throw the box around like it's roofied coed during spring fling. I'm thru trying. I'm sure somewhere, somehow glass can be successfully shipped. But not to me, not today.
customer_reviews.author: David Manno

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Jungle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great large enclosure which we used to create a “mighty jungle” for our green anoles. We now have 3 lamps clipped on top and they’re stable. The large front opening makes it easy to tend to the lizards and plants. We successfully maintain a temperature gradient of about 68 degrees in one lower corner to 85 degrees in the opposite higher corner.
customer_reviews.author: Zhandra

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge
customer_reviews.text: My 3 Australian tree frogs are in heaven living in this. Only thing that sucks is the vents are big and smaller sized crickets can sneak out. Had crickets everywhere til I found out where they were getting out from. Used painters tape to seal it up. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I have no doubts that this is a good quality item. Unfortunately when mine arrived one side was completely busted. Unsure if it happened during transit or what. Fortunately I was refunded fully. Instead I got the thrive version of the same tank at my local petsmart. The thrive version came with other items (substrate, plants, etc.) and was cheaper. I’m sure this tank is sturdy usually, but mine was not inside the box at least.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tank for a new snake. It arrived with the glass broken. I sent it back for a replacement and everything seemed fine. I got the new snake and a week later the mesh top snapped and the snake escaped! I’m very upset about the quality of this product and would warn anyone against buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Crested Geckos
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Exo Terra 18x18x24. My crested gecko loves it also. They is so much room in this tank, and perfect for aborial animals. Just make sure you're careful moving the tank, the glass isn't very thick. Also it's great that I'm able to hide all the wires behind the background. But keep in mind if you want to unplug anything you have to take everything out to get the electric item out of the tank. I'm in love with the convenience of the whole thing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Order Off Amazon, Will Arrive Broken (Most Likely)
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, Exo Terra makes high-quality and user-friendly products, however I HIGHLY discourage anyone to order a glass terrarium, especially of this size, off amazon. The product I received came with one of the doors completely shattered, and the worst part is whoever shipped the product made no attempt to ensure the product would arrive in-tact, no extra padding, not even a freaking fragile sticker. If you want an Exo Terra terrarium either buy one in-person, or order from a website that you can trust to package the product proficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loyal to Exo-Terra for decades
customer_reviews.text: Exo-Terra terrariums have never disappointed me. The front opening doors make enclosure maintenance, feeding, watering, and handling of your animal a breeze. All of my 9 enclosures are ExoTerra and life has been made 100x easier and less frustrating when it is the dreaded cleaning day. Feeding is a breeze, and the front opening doors make taking my reptiles out less stressful on myself and the animal.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie J

customer_reviews.title: Shattered to pieces
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this arrived in one piece since there are so many good reviews but it arrived shattered and in total pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Molina

customer_reviews.title: Broken :(
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a huge crack on the side and a big piece of glass missing, which we found on top of the tank, like someone had placed it there. Disappointed. I expected more from such a reputable seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love the Exo Terra Allglass Terrarium! I guess what's more important is the fact that my crested gecko Fredrick loves it!! The terrarium he has lived in for 5 years was great, but he has more height and absolutely loves roaming! The 2 glass doors in the front make it much easier to feed and water and also to get him out when he needs some loving!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Peak

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and WOW! I got my first crested gecko about three months ago and had him in a smaller cage, and so I got the small tall (He needed a bigger cage), I wasn't sure how big it was gonna be but its huge and AWESOME! And I'm so excited I hope it isn't too big but I cant wait to put all kinds of decoration in. It came very nicely packed and I would of been surprised if it had a crack! (Which it doesn't) I really like this buy and I will buy this again no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Sf

customer_reviews.title: Show case your reptile
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 and I purchased a domed hanging terrarium with waterfall for a crested gecko for my 5 year old Great Grandson. This was a disaster for so many reasons. So I went shopping for the perfect home for Red Joey and liked this Exo Glass Terrarium. I ordered it and was so pleased. It was very heavy, packed well, in one piece and simply beautiful. I absolutely love this terrarium, easy to clean and we can see Red Joey were ever he goes. For a beginner, like me or the experienced, this is a beautiful show case for your reptile. I would certainly purchase this again and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: CASEY

customer_reviews.title: Gecko is happy
customer_reviews.text: Great for my day gecko. Heavy, good quality tank, mesh top is perfect for my heat lamp, foam background gives it the perfect backdrop for however you want to decorate. I put a few piece of bamboo for easy climbing and basking.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Nice big new home for my Venezuelan Suntiger
customer_reviews.text: Nice big new home for my Venezuelan Suntiger, being she is arboreal she needs plenty of room to climb. Only added a couple accessories, but has plenty more room for more. I got the small/tall variation, 18x18x24.
customer_reviews.author: txO4

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for young Chinese water Dragon
customer_reviews.text: Got our terrarium today for my daughter’s Chinese water dragon and it came very well package, we got the 18 x 18 x 24 it was actually a lot bigger than what we thought it was going to be ( which is awesome) it’s a good item for the price, we are extremely happy with it and we are pretty sure our little buddy likes it to !! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Baize2833

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: This tank is sturdy and very neat. My daughter does well taking care of her snake. She is 10 and this cage makes it easier for her to get inside and handle her snake better as well as maintain the cage. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: leila

customer_reviews.title: a drag
customer_reviews.text: If you want one of these you'll have to go through a painful process of it getting shipped to you broken, you trying to return it, having to email people endlessly just to end up being unenthused when you get your box not broken two months later after you planned to have your animal shipped to you.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and large
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and large terrarium. I am using this for a bioactive setup for my crested gecko and it seems like a perfect size for him. It has the right amount of depth at the bottom for the substrate and I was able to plant 6 medium sized plants in it. I also have a bark hide and vines for him to climb on.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken and when I called the company which was recommended I was told they couldn’t do anything for me. There was no option for an exchange so I’m unable to get a new one and am stuck without a home for my cresties. The terrarium also arrived late. Definitely do not recommend despite being cheaper than elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Cresties love it
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my 12x12x18 to this. Exo terra terrariums are a little pricey comparatively, but it's well worth it. Sturdy thick glass, good lock, and great design.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan jefcoats

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little afraid that this terrarium would arrive broken, but the day that it was delivered, it was in good shape. My son wanted this for his gecko and he was well-pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Holak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome terrarium
customer_reviews.text: Love these terrariums! On our third size with Exo Terra brand. This purchase was the 18x18x24 for a 5 year old Crested Gecko. Love the easy access doors and premade backgrounds. Our intial order arrived with broken glass, this can happen however very impressed with the seller being kind, great customer service and quickly replacing the order. The new one arrived perfect. Highly recommend and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Plants, Too!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just set up my first of three of these terrariums (all different sizes) and it's perfect for what I wanted them for: to keep a few plants indoors all year round and (after adding a plant light) not having to worry about keeping the plants close to a window. The backdrop shown in the picture doesn't need to be used so I put the "plant box" in the middle of the room on a table and my bonsai tree can be viewed from any angle. Great, multiuse product.
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: Larger than you may think!
customer_reviews.text: The seller was absolutely amazing and considering how large the tank is, it’s an amazing price! My crested gecko has plenty of room now he’s not cramped. He can grow to his hearts content. You could easily house 2 cresties in this I think. It’s my favorite tank now!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought the screen one first big mistake I got this one I love it way better for a cameleon holds the humidity and heat in with my ac on high love this perfect
customer_reviews.author: LoverOfAll

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Snake thrilled (cornsnake), has VERY large male parent; so expecting some size.
customer_reviews.author: fonz

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Not only was this product late but it was completely broken when I received it. I returned it immediately which is a shame because I k ow this company to be good quality and I got it for a good price. Now it’s unavailable. Very sad
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Terrarium
customer_reviews.text: This Terrarium is wonderful!! It is large and has two big glass doors which makes it very easy to maintain, clean, feed etc. The top is screen and perfect for misting or to use with an automatic mister as I do. My reptiles love their home!!!
customer_reviews.author: daubs

customer_reviews.title: Good quality habitat for gecko
customer_reviews.text: Great environment for my son's gecko. Height is important because they are arboreal. Nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for crested gecko!
customer_reviews.text: My crestie 🦎 is very happy with his new home! Really good size, probably won’t have to upgrade ever again. :) the sides open with ease making spritzing an ease. and lock seems to be holding up well. Greg seems happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Terrarium
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice esthetically pleasing tank that's durable and reliable. I love everything about these terrariums. I made this one up for my Red eyed tree frogs.
customer_reviews.author: Tigersicord

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great brand
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived unharmed and was easy to set up. I have a 5 year old crested gecko in it and so far she seems to have adjusted to her tank upgrade well. The back styrofoam wall fits well. The front door and locks work as they should. I’ve own the smaller version of this product (the 12x12x18) and both have been great!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tank! A lot bigger than I expected which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Brazzale

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome new home for our crested gecko. Arrived quickly and in great shape. Even better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: arrived utterly shattered
customer_reviews.text: i’m beyond irritated. i waited a week with delays for a shattered piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Tanja Blough

customer_reviews.title: Good tank, UPS sucks
customer_reviews.text: The cage itself was good, although UPS decided to shatter the entire tank while delivering it. We got a refund, however.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good tank
customer_reviews.text: Large terrarium. My gecko seems to like the upgrade. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: very nice and good value
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! The company I purchased from was great and it was doubled boxed. Arrived safe and sound. I had an issue and they resolved it quickly. It is well made and takes care of my frog and lizard perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney P. Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Our bumblebee dart frogs love their new home.
customer_reviews.text: Our frogs absolutely love the space. You can see your friends very well through the glass that is just thick enough. The lock, though a great feature, is a bit loud when unlocking. I say this because some of our frogs are a little less bold than others, and will get a little stressed if we open it too quickly. I would buy an Exo Terra product again, and hopefully will.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Easy access, well throught out design
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a single green anole lizard; it's just the right size, has easy access for cleaning, feeding, misting, etc. A nice design, though I wonder about the plastic latch on the front doors ... should that break the only option to keep the doors closed will be tape. There also seems to be no mechanism to lock the doors, which in a house with youngsters can be a potential problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice terrarium.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given five stars as the overall terrarium is very nice but the front lower glass seems to have been cut a bit small and there's silicone applied to the outside of that piece kind of ruining the aesthetic. Otherwise very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The terrarium was cracked when it arrived. They don't seem to package it with the product's well-being in mind. They just put a little foam on the corners and send it off. Not a very good idea for a glass enclosure, in my opinion. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great for young crested geckos
customer_reviews.text: Great for young crested geckos. You'll need to upgrade when they get to about 10 months old, but my baby could find the food bowl easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Terrarium arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Product box undamaged, but terrarium had broken glass. This happen twice, so I have two terrariums with broken glass.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Good for bigger pets
customer_reviews.text: Lots of holes so make sure you don't feed whatever you have in this small insects like fruit flies.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Cowan

customer_reviews.title: I really thought it was gonna come in good shape
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to get it and when it came it was BROKEN!
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed. Large door opening for easy cleaning. Just enough ventilation. Good size for an adult crested gecko. The only downside is the glass seems thin. Be very care when unpacking it or moving it.
customer_reviews.author: Friend of Fauna

customer_reviews.title: Giant Day Geckos Love this Terrarium
customer_reviews.text: Terrarium was packaged very well to avoid any potential damage and arrived in perfect condition. The terrarium itself is amazing and my Giant Day Geckos live it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Karczewski

customer_reviews.title: It felt like taking apart a Russian stacking doll
customer_reviews.text: Very solid packaging made sure that the terrarium was not damaged. It felt like taking apart a Russian stacking doll, actually. My gargoyle gecko loves it a lot, I've noticed that her activity is increased in this larger enclosure. Very good for display. The only issue I have is how hard it is to turn the Exo Terra logo to open up the enclosure. If that's all I have to deal with to have a happier gecko, then I'd say it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I think it will be a great product if we can get it in one piece
customer_reviews.text: So this just got delivered an hour ago. It was in my front porch when I got home. When my son and I Picked it up to bring it inside you could hear that the glass was shattered. Amazon has already started the Process to replace it! I think it will be a great product if we can get it in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Aldr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tank!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 3 white dumpy tree frongs.. and we love it, its a nice set up and i would buy another one if we need it! It was well packages and shiped well. The deliver people called ahead to set up a time to drop it off and they took good care of it.. Like i said, i would totaly buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: The Youngmans

customer_reviews.title: Smart purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and well packaged. Lovely, quality terrarium, and front opening doors make caring for you critter so much easier. Their vented doors also allow for good air flow yet still aide in retaining humility.
customer_reviews.author: Tajar Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Exoterra enclosures. They are a top of the line product for housing reptiles and amphibians. They look sleek, hold up well, and are easy to clean. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: SarahK

customer_reviews.title: Doors open and close very nicely, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Wish the gap between the doors was smaller. There are also gaps on the outside edges of doors. If you want to keep in fruit flies, you will have to make modifications to this terrarium. Doors open and close very nicely, looks great, door lock is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: M. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. I purchased one and it came broken I then purchased a second tank and it also arrived broken I then purchased a third tank and it also arrived broken. Don’t waste your time and money
customer_reviews.author: Ella Knause

customer_reviews.title: Great tank for crested gecko
customer_reviews.text: This tank is awesome and it was bigger than I expected! It was packaged very well and arrived in great condition right when it was supposed to. The background is styrofoam but looks realistic and is climbable. My crested gecko loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great!
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly what I wanted and arrived at my house safely and not broken at all. The way they package it would make it near impossible to shatter. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for crested gecko
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful terrarium ideal size for a crested gecko replaced the foam backing with a custom built cork panel with cork rounds has plenty of room for a substrate layer for a bioactive build do not regret getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this item for my tree snakes
customer_reviews.text: I love this item for my tree snakes. It is very heavy and holds heat in great. The locking doors are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Lyn

customer_reviews.title: For Crested Geckos.
customer_reviews.text: The Crested Geckos love it. Plenty of space to climb up. I also use magnetic rock platforms with this enclosure. On a side note, crickets have chewed through the Styrofoam throughout time.
customer_reviews.author: Sheyenne L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful terrarium. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful terrarium. Excellent quality, the background and the screen at the top looks fantastic. The locks work great and are very unique. It was packaged well also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was well worth the purchase. I love the vertical space for my pets and it is roomy even with plants in it. I was able to grow live plants in it and I have a leopard gecko, a red bellied toad, and a fence lizard all happily co-existing. It was great that the rock wall came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Keaton M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Well made terrarium! Packed very well and arrived in excellent condition. Can't wait to fill it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Exo Terra Terrariums
customer_reviews.text: Love the Exo Terra Terrariums. Have several for all of my Terrariums, they keep what needs to stay in inside and what needs to stay out on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Ken P.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: this thing is AWESOME!!!!!!!!!!! I highly recommend getting one if youre thinking about it! If you have a lizard or small snake they are PERFECT, and lots of fun to decorate. Put some plantation soil and live plants in there and you've got a living terrarium!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Moon

customer_reviews.title: ... now for over a year and it's working out great. Easy to maintain and gives a good view ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this up and running now for over a year and it's working out great. Easy to maintain and gives a good view of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schmidtke

customer_reviews.title: Great for my single adult crested gecko
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! My crested gecko loves the vertical climbing space that this terrarium provides. I love the natural-looking foam background. Good ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostwolf

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get pets in n out
customer_reviews.text: Easy to add water /food & magnetic faux rock ledges
customer_reviews.author: BLue Iris 64

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Packaged excellent so there was no damage during shipment. Very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: I was offered the amazon card and took it! ...
customer_reviews.text: I was offered the amazon card and took it! all in all, with prime, this lizard cage only cost me 30 bux! cant beat that anywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnnybigfish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this terrarium and so does his crested gecko!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adult crestie home
customer_reviews.text: Houses my two adult crested geckos, I love it!! I have a male and female with room for one more if i add in another large plant or vine
customer_reviews.author: virenex

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery, amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Love this terrarium! Perfect for our crested gecko and looks amazing. Couldn’t ask for anything better, looks so nice and plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomersince1999

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The is a great terrarium and my little baby gecko loves it he climbs all over this tank
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: 90% OF IT DIDNT COME ANNWHAT DID WAS BROKEN AFYER A WEEK LATE NEVER BUYING FROM THIS PERSON AGIN
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Great, with one problem
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 18x18x24 inch tank for my crested gecko, and it looks amazing. The background looks very nice and the tank looks quite sturdy. But, the plastic pieces, such as the locking system, seem to be flimsy, and could break after a while of use. Other than that, the tank is very good.
customer_reviews.author: kiwi.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product arrived next day of when I ordered it and it looks really nice
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Nice Terrarium
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected, I love it, and works well for a crested gecko and even smaller species such as a Lygodactlus Willaimsi, I placed the Dual Canopy on top also made by Exo terra, and works very well together.
customer_reviews.author: lela B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design, came in really nice/safe packaging and arrived early. Very heavy duty, can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Came sooner than I expected and in perfect condition. It works great and is exactly as ...
customer_reviews.text: Came sooner than I expected and in perfect condition. It works great and is exactly as described. Very happy with it. Only con is the Styrofoam rock backdrop looks hoakie due to the obvious points of manufacturing process where you can see circles with dots inside as part of the mold. Very unprofessional. The rest is great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for two crested geckos and it is perfect for them. It's very nice looking and built well. It's very easy to clean and maintain as well, and holds a lot of plants and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: amazing price with great delivery not a single scratch complety in tack.. just as described fake rock backgrounds is made to help hide any wires and or tubes you may need to put in there. screen top latches in place also small holes in the very back witch are only open if you open them to put in wires or tuber and you can keep the other close so no kritters can escape front dooors open from side to side and it has a locking latch and holes for a lock.i set this up for my mountian horned lizard and she loves it alot......
customer_reviews.author: bryan rogers

customer_reviews.title: so happy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my (climbing) tokay gecko. She LOVES it! Got a bunch of fake plants and stuff and she climbs around all night, so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did arrive broken but the seller was very easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: Did arrive broken but the seller was very easy to work with. Overall, very happy with the product itself. Perfect for an adult Crested Gecko.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hancock

customer_reviews.title: I was able to set up a replacement that same night and it arrived the same week and a day early in perfect condition. The cage l
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a new cage for my crested gecko to go with the exo Terra stand I'd been given as a moving gift. The cage arrived on time but sadly was shattered. I was able to set up a replacement that same night and it arrived the same week and a day early in perfect condition. The cage looks great and my gecko seems to like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Ideal tank for crested geckos!
customer_reviews.text: Great tank! Love the lockable doors on the front. Escape proof which is great for our two crested geckos. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Micah D.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good looking
customer_reviews.text: It is sleek, modern, and sturdy. It is used for a crested gecko
customer_reviews.author: carrie orgera

customer_reviews.title: Awsome looking and easy to maintain
customer_reviews.text: Awsome terranium for my tree frogs. Large and durable. The love it
customer_reviews.author: werm

customer_reviews.title: Really like this terrarium for our bearded dragon
customer_reviews.text: Really like this terrarium for our bearded dragon. When I first upgraded, I didn't think of heating this size vs my old. We had to improvise heat a couple of days until I received the heating mat. My 4 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Measure your space, it is much larger than she visualized it would be.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for granddaughter and her gecko. Arrived in excellent condition (mostly glass). Met all her expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra W.

customer_reviews.title: The reptiles like to call it home....
customer_reviews.text: I have one for the frogs and one for the chameleon. They haven’t complained so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YAY exo terra!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I always love my exo terras. This one is my second 18x18x24, fourth exo terra at all, and it came in perfect condition just like the rest! Front opening doors make cleaning and general access a breeze. The top screen handles a lot of heat and makes misting simple. The natural background I would leave for a custom made one due to the crappy foam. That being said, I have some with the background since it's cheaper for now. Great ventilation for rain forest/dessert species...not anything like a chameleon. All in all, worth the investment!!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Packaged with care! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, have many exoterras and love them. Buying these online can be tricky due to the glass. This was packaged wonderfully! Boxed within box, within box, with paper padding. No way this can break during shipping! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin A.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I have three very happy barking tree frogs. They bark their little hearts out and enjoy their home. Happy campers.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: nice cage
customer_reviews.text: works well for my snake, only negative is the background which has enough room for the snake to get behind so I removed it.
customer_reviews.author: richscha

customer_reviews.title: Love Exo Terra
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these tanks and my animals and I love them. I love the front swinging doors, makes it easy to get pet out and clean, with a little work holds temp and humidity great.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and well put together. It's everything they advertise. I would definitely recommend it to anyone. Just be sure to order correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great quality......especially for the price....
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, large, for my family of five green anoles, plenty of space for all of them to move around and sleep. Great quality product. Highly recommend this terrarium to any one.
customer_reviews.author: cat girl

customer_reviews.title: looks smart
customer_reviews.text: My geckos love this tank. Easy to feed and clean. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Exo Terra Glass Natural Terrarium Kit, for Reptiles and Amphibians, Small Tall, 18 x 18 x 24 inches, PT2607A1
product_meta.description: Exo Terra Glass Terrarium Reptile Kit is the ideal amphibian or reptile enclosure designed by European herpetologists. Reptile habitat’s front doors allow easy access for maintenance and feeding. A specially designed lock will prevent escape and the doors can be opened separately. The full screen top ventilation allows UVB reptile light and infrared penetration and is completely removable for easy access while decorating or cleaning. In the back of the screen cover are 5 closable wire or tube inlets on both sides to install Heat Wave reptile rocks, reptile waterfalls, sensors, etc. inside the terrarium. The bottom plate of the reptile tank is raised to mount a substrate reptile heater to heat a part of the extended ground surface. The extra high fixed front window is ideal for thick layers of reptile substrates or reptile bedding (burrowing reptiles), reptile aquarium parts (Paludarium) or to mount a reptile hide den. The natural reptile background is the same color as other Exo Terra reptile décor items and provides a reptile climbing décor dimension. Exo Terra has designed and developed a wide range of reptile accessories, terrarium décor, and terrariums for a variety of reptiles and amphibian pets including bearded dragons, geckos, snakes, crested geckos, turtles, chameleons, leopard geckos, lizards, and frogs. Some of the reptile supplies include: reptile heat lamps, reptile heating pads, reptile thermostats, reptile humidifiers, reptile mister, reptile thermometer, reptile water bowls, reptile fogger, reptile lights, reptile heat bulbs, reptile plants (fake plants), reptile vines, reptile tank accessories, reptile tank décor, reptile heat mat, reptile lamps, reptile tweezers, reptile hides and caves, reptile food, reptile calcium, reptile light fixtures, reptile basking lights, reptile caves, reptile feeding tongs, reptile food dishes, reptile dripper, and reptile starter kits. Reptile cage terrarium is 18 W x 18 D x 24 H inches (45.72 x 45.72 x 60.96 cm)
feature_bullets: Glass terrarium for reptiles or amphibians
Raised bottom frame in order to fit a substrate heater and has a waterproof bottom
Escape-proof dual doors lock to prevent escape
Closable inlets for wires and/or tubing management
Reptile Terrarium Dimensions: 18 W x 18 D x 24 H inches (45.72 x 45.72 x 60.96 cm)
